name: Wikimedia Page Content
description: Retrieves complete HTML content of any Wikimedia page by title. Supports multiple languages and projects
author: Shinkai

project.description: Target Wikimedia project (wikipedia, wiktionary, etc). Default: wikipedia

language.description: Two-letter ISO language code (en, es, fr, etc). Must be supported by project. Default: en

title.description: Exact page title to retrieve. Case-sensitive and must exist in selected project/language
Normalized page title as returned by the API

html.description: Complete HTML content of the page

url.description: Full URL to view the page in a web browser

lastModified.description: Timestamp of last page modification (ISO format)

language.description: Language code of the retrieved content
